objects

Class PoolBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.PoolBall

  • public class PoolBall
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for a pool ball. Subclass this, calling the super constructor and filling in the appropriate values (colour and point value)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PoolBall.Type
      Enum for every different type of Snooker ball

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.jogamp.vecmath.Color3f clr
      Colour of the sphere for this ball
      private static double height
      The Y-up value that all balls spawn and rest at
      private int pointValue
      Number of points this ball is worth
      private org.jogamp.vecmath.Vector3d pos
      Worldspace position of this ball
      private org.jogamp.java3d.Transform3D t
      The transform that translates this ball to it's position
      private org.jogamp.java3d.TransformGroup tg
      The transformgroup that carries the ball's sphere object

    • Constructor Detail

      • PoolBall

        public PoolBall(PoolBall.Type type,
                double x,
                double z)
        Default and only constructor for a pool ball
        Parameters:
        type - The type of Snooker pool ball. Use the enum PoolBall.Type
        x - x-right position of this ball to spawn and rest at
        z - z-forward position of this ball to spawn and rest at

    • Method Detail

      • createBallAppearance

        private static org.jogamp.java3d.Appearance createBallAppearance(org.jogamp.vecmath.Color3f clr)
        private static method that creates an Appearance for this ball of the given colour. Only used in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        clr - The colour to set the new appearance to
        Returns:
        The new Appearance object, to make our sphere with

      • getTG

        public org.jogamp.java3d.TransformGroup getTG()
        Getter for the transform group that is created with the ball and contains the ball.
        Returns:
        The TransformGroup that contains this ball

      • getPointValue

        public int getPointValue()
        Returns the number of points this ball is worth
        Returns:
        Integer value of this ball

      • getColour

        public org.jogamp.vecmath.Color3f getColour()
        Returns the colour of this ball
        Returns:
        Color3f of this ball

      • getHeight

        public static double getHeight()
        Static method that returns the y-up height that all pool balls spawn, move, and rest at.
        Returns:
        Height position on the y-up axis

      • getPos

        public org.jogamp.vecmath.Vector3d getPos()
        Gets the worldspace position of this ball
        Returns:
        The position of this ball as a Vector3d

      • getPos

        public void getPos(org.jogamp.vecmath.Vector3d posRef)
        Sets the value of the given Vector3d reference to this ball's position
        Parameters:
        posRef - Reference to a Vector3d to edit

      • setPos

        public void setPos(org.jogamp.vecmath.Vector3d pos)
        Sets the position of this ball and updates the TransformGroup of this ball.
        Parameters:
        pos - The new position to set to. The y value is ignored and replace with the static height.

      • setPos

        public void setPos(double x,
                   double z)
        Sets the position of this ball and updates the TransformGroup of this ball.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x-right position to set to
        z - The new z-forward position to set to
